#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define gc getchar
typedef long long int ll;
using namespace std;
ll read_int() {
char c = gc();
while(c<'0' || c>'9') c = gc();
ll ret = 0;
while(c>='0' && c<='9') {
ret = 10 * ret + c - 48;
c = gc();
}
return ret;
}
ll fastPower(ll base,ll power,ll M)
{
        ll result=1;
        while (power>0)
        {
                if (power%2==1)
                        result = (result*base)%M;
                base = (base*base)%M;
                power/=2;
        }
        return result;
}
int main()
{
    ll t,n,x,y;
    cin>>t;
    cin>>n;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>x>>y;
        cout<<fastPower(x,y,n)<<'\n';
    }
    return 0;
}
